My Projects

Live Source

Traffic Sign Classification CNN

In this project, I built and trained a Convolutional Neural Network model using Keras to classify traffic based on german traffic sign dataset and achieved a 98.4% accuracy. The project was a nice challenge to help catch the glimpse of CovNet's. A project that presented quite a challenge to get the hang of everything and an exiting field in Deep Learning.

Live Source

Machine Learning Music Recommender

In this project, I built and trained a Music Recommender for an online music store using random made-up data. When users sign-in, the store ask for their age and gender, then based on their profile Music-Recommender recommend music they are likely to buy. This may be used to increase sell. It's 100% accurate because of the simplicity of made-up dataset.

Live Source

Budget Web Application

This app allow us to add Income and Expenses for a certain month. The application then calculate how much money we have made and how much we have spent. Finally it displays a nice,readable and understandble budget.
